reviews.text: 대전 내에 있는 산. 산같기도 하면서 둘레길 같기도 한, 딱 적당히 하이킹하기에 좋은 곳이다. 하이킹코스도 무척많아 대전에서는 인기가 좋은 산이다.
대전 중구에 위치하고 있는산으로 산책하기에 좋은곳입니다. 작은 카페도 운치있고 보리밥 등 먹거리도 좋네요. 특히 호떡 유명하죠. 유독 줄 서있는 곳을 찾아가면 쉽게 찾을수있습니다. 아쿠아리움도 있어 가족단위로 많이 오시는거 같네요. 등산하시는분들도  많지만 얘들데리고 주말에 반나절정도 시간보내기에는 좋아보이네요.
보문산 전망대 보운대에 가면 대전 전경이 한눈에 들어와요. 살짜쿵 가벼운 산책 수준의 산행이라 좋고 주차장과 전망대가 10여분 거리라 좋아요. 그 외에 길고 짧은 트레킹 코스는 다음 여정을 기대하게 합니다.
얼마전공사중이던데요. 계단바뀌고 오르기 더 좋아졌네요.
워낙 산을 좋아해서 그냥 다 좋아요

There are 2 tracking route in general in jangtaesan area. If you come from daejeon, when you alight from the bus, go right for longer track and less people and this one is not advertised that much. However, if you want to see the place that is advertised or reviewed by many traveller, go across the street and you will see the main entrance (the picture). This place offers 3 route of trekking: (1) 1.3 km, (2) 3.34 km, and (3) 10.35 km. 
I pick the second route 3.34 km and I found that the filed was not that hard but you need to be careful with your step. And applying bug repellant before trekking would help you a lot.
Great place for day out

처음 1~2km만 고생하면 평지처럼 등산하기 편한곳. 
황토길 14.5km완주하기를 강력추천! 뒷쪽으로 반대로 돌면서 절바위에서 능선을 타고 산성 정상을 거쳐 등반을 끝내면 4시간이 정도 걸림.아주 전망좋은 훌륭한 등산코스 임.

푸른나무들과
봉황정 계족산성  자연의 선물입니다
우리몸에 유익한것만 주는
산입니다    신선한공기와 힐링하고
가세요   건강해집니다
잘정비되어있는 도로와 가로등과 화장실등 쉽고 편하게 등산을 할 수 있게 되어있어 좋았습니다.
대전에서 트래킹하기 좋은산입니다..
산정산은 미흡하나, 계족산성과 다양한 루트, 오르기 쉬움이  만회
Only 500 won! Thats like 50cents and it was so beautiful although its jpt that big it is definitely worth the time :)

Very interesting museum. They currently have exhibits based on bio mimicry and bio tech art.  The museum itself is small and takes about 1 hour to view everything. There is a small cafe for drinks and small dishes. There is an interactive robot but that exhibit only opens from 2-3pm.
They have rotating exhibitions, but they're all really small. Hard to spend more than half an hour here. Cheap admission though.

This place was a bit odd to me. I'm all for the arts but I was thinking this place was going to be one of those picture art places not gene splicing horse and human DNA to give a human prosthetic horse legs type art. So it was kinda weird. 

At the start of the tour, a lot of the art pieces were about body heat activated lights that were in a dark room. I enjoyed this.

But toward the end, it was about prosthetics and people being controlled by robots. 

I am not an art person so I'm saying that this place wasn't my cup of tea per say.
The exhibits can be hit or miss, but generally the museum showcases some interesting things. Worth a trip if you like art and the price of the exhibit is low. The surroundings are nice for a stroll.

Really good cemetery place. It has wide area and comfortable for hiking or jogging.

The grave also well organized. Good place for "the last rest" for all the Korean Heroes during Korean War.
What a beautiful resting place to honor all whom rest here. A heaven on earth!

Place for prayer 
Braved men are here

둘레길을 추천합니다.
주차장이 넉넉하고 깨끗한 화장실이 꼭
필요한 곳에 있어요.~
총 10.04km 구간에 노송들과 대나무들이 
장엄하죠.~

조국을위해헌신하신호국영령ㆍ애국순국선열모신곳으로엄숙하고경건맘의로묵념과명복을ㆍ국립현춤원본관사무실민원봉사실ㆍ현충문ㆍ호국분수대ㆍ보훈미래관ㆍ호국철도기념관ㆍ현충관(행사장).봉안관ㆍ매점(팀ㆍ태극기ㆍ조화아주저렴함니다)ㆍ야외전시실ㆍ구암사(무료국수제공12시~13시30분까지)애국지사묘ㆍ장군ㆍ장교ㆍ사병ㆍ경찰관묘ㆍ연천530Gp순직자ㆍ제2연평새전사ㆍ연평도폭격전사자ㆍ천안함전사자묘등ㆍ아주정리정돈잘조성된조경시설및곳곳휴식할수있도록정자시설ㆍ
A place where you can go for a walk after learning about the history of surnames. There are duck boat rides, too!
Awesome park with lights in evening with lights it's beautiful
Good and value to visit
wild scape

Nice place with great view. Camping site also available. There's a museum with historically important information about Korean clans. Convenient store is also available that sells coffee snacks. They also rent the camping gear

Great place to watch a baseball game. The atmosphere is pretty incredible. The stadium itself is small compared with American stadiums. Security was quick. The store is small and very crowded before the game. Recommend arriving early if you want to buy something. The food choices vary but are mostly chicken dishes. If you want the home field atmosphere do not sit in the 312-307 seats as this is for the away team. They sing and chant all game long so you don’t hear the Eagles chants.

한화 팬이라면 ㅎㅎ
Good place for watching Korean baseball playimg if you fan of Hanhwa egles then you should go there!

The park is large, and the games are lively with lots of cheers. There are also food and snacks sold around the stadium such as chicken, ice cream, beer, juices and water. Oh, bring your cheerleader spirit cause it’s fun!
Cheap tickets and great experience. You can bring food in from outside the stadium which I would recommend bc everything in the stadium and surrounding areas is over priced fried chicken.
Great Korean baseball experience. I highly recommend everyone going.
Only 500 won! Thats like 50cents and it was so beautiful although its jpt that big it is definitely worth the time :)

Very interesting museum. They currently have exhibits based on bio mimicry and bio tech art.  The museum itself is small and takes about 1 hour to view everything. There is a small cafe for drinks and small dishes. There is an interactive robot but that exhibit only opens from 2-3pm.
They have rotating exhibitions, but they're all really small. Hard to spend more than half an hour here. Cheap admission though.

This place was a bit odd to me. I'm all for the arts but I was thinking this place was going to be one of those picture art places not gene splicing horse and human DNA to give a human prosthetic horse legs type art. So it was kinda weird. 

At the start of the tour, a lot of the art pieces were about body heat activated lights that were in a dark room. I enjoyed this.

But toward the end, it was about prosthetics and people being controlled by robots. 

I am not an art person so I'm saying that this place wasn't my cup of tea per say.
The exhibits can be hit or miss, but generally the museum showcases some interesting things. Worth a trip if you like art and the price of the exhibit is low. The surroundings are nice for a stroll.
The food was delicious. I'm happy I found a vegan place to go in Daejeon. They even sell other vegan items like detergent, chocolate bars, soap and soy protein. Will definitely go back!
Friendly owner who speaks English well:) The food is great too!
Ok
모든재료와 식감이  만점 주고 싶네요.   맛과  영양을  생각한 국산 재료와  식감이  대박입니다.

음식은 좋습니다
주인장이 불친절합니다
The atmosphere of the restaurant is really good. Not to mention, the food is also great. Highly recommend

Flying Pan is located in the busy and congested Eunhaengdong, neighbourhood. Ambiance was good & I would say food was like 6/10. Steak though was good but was slightly cold, maybe from keeping it waiting for the others dishes  to finish and the rice dish was 2/10. I would give them another try if they improve their culinary skills.

It's an okay place to have a semi-Italian meal. Prices seem a bit high for the amount you get, but the taste is good if not always really Italian. The atmosphere is nothing special. Get there early for dinner because they sometimes run out of a few dishes on the weekend.
good
Delicioso! Yummy! The service is amazingly efficient. The staff seems to do everything with a smile. Truly an A+ experience.
감자탕에서 약간 카레맛이 나는게 맛있습니다. 사장님 너무 친절하시고 술은 안팔아요~
벚꽃 피면 진짜 이쁠꺼 같아요
베리베리 굿. Two Thumbs Up!
ㅋㅋ
